author.name: CFS is not M.E.
author.description: CFS is the name used by psychiatrists who refuse to accept that ME actually exists - yet who control ME policy in the UK.  You have been warned!

author.name: ME for M.E.
author.description: Just a girl raising awareness for the neuro-immune disease Myalgic Encephalomyelitis. ME is not fatigue, it's Post Exertional Malaise! ME.for.M.E2011@gmail.com

author.name: Janet Graham
author.description: Scottish Canadian ME Patient for 29 years. Need more real medical research. No more Psychobabble.  Independence for Scotland.  Still YES!
